flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s bodynare very sharp edged. This POKéMON isnvery agile - it leaps all over thefbranches of trees and jumps on its foenfrom above or behind.
SCEPTILE has seeds growing on its back.nThey are said to be bursting withnnutrients that revitalize trees.fThis POKéMON raises the trees in anforest with loving care.
In the jungle, its power is without equal.nThis POKéMON carefully grows trees andnplants. It regulates its body temperaturenby basking in sunlight.
The leaves on its forelegs are as sharpnas swords. It agilely leaps about thenbranches of trees to strike.
The leaves on its forelegs are as sharpnas swords. It agilely leaps about thenbranches of trees to strike.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
It agilely leaps about the junglenand uses the sharp leaves on itsnarms to strike its prey.
It agilely leaps about the junglenand uses the sharp leaves on itsnarms to strike its prey.
Les feuilles sur ses bras peuventntrancher des troncs épais. C’estnle meilleur combattant des jungles.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
Les feuilles sur ses bras peuventntrancher des troncs épais. C’estnle meilleur combattant des jungles.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
The leaves that grow on its armsncan slice down thick trees. It isnwithout peer in jungle combat.
うでに　はえた　はっぱは　たいぼくもnすっぱり　きりたおす　きれあじ。nみつりんの　たたかいでは　むてき。
팔에 자란 잎사귀는 큰 나무도n싹둑 베어 넘어뜨리는 정도다.n밀림의 싸움에서는 무적이다.
Les feuilles sur ses bras peuvent trancher des troncsnépais. C’est le meilleur combattant des jungles.
Die Blätter an seinen Armen können dicke Bäumenfällen. Im Dschungelkampf gibt es kein stärkeresnPokémon.
Las hojas de sus brazos pueden cortar gruesosnárboles. Invencible en los combates en la jungla.
Le foglie che crescono sulle sue braccia taglianonanche grandi alberi. Nel suo habitat, è imbattibile.
The leaves that grow on its arms can slice downnthick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
腕に　生えた　葉っぱは　大木もnスッパリ　切り倒す　切れ味。n密林の　戦いでは　無敵。
ジャングルを　みがるに　はしりまわりnうでに　はえた　きれあじ　するどいnはっぱで　えものを　しとめるのだ。
정글을 가볍게 뛰어n팔에 자란 예리하며 잘 드는n잎날로 먹이를 꼼짝 못하게 한다.
Il parcourt la jungle avec agilité et attaque ses proiesngrâce aux feuilles tranchantes sur ses bras.
Flink zischt es durch den Dschungel. Mit dennBlattklingen an seinen Armen schlägt es seine Beute.
Corre con elegancia de un lugar a otro de la selva ynusa las afiladas hojas de sus brazos para cazar.
Percorre agile e veloce la giungla abbattendo le predencon le affilate foglie che ha sugli arti anteriori.
It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharpnleaves on its arms to strike its prey.
ジャングルを　身軽に　走り回りn腕に　生えた　切れ味　鋭い　葉っぱでn獲物を　しとめるのだ。
からだに　はえた　はっぱは　するどい　きれあじ。nすばやい　みのこなしで　きの　えだを　とびまわりnてきの　ずじょうや　はいごから　おそいかかるぞ。
몸에 난 잎사귀는 예리한 칼과 같다.n빠른 몸놀림으로 나뭇가지를 뛰어다니며n적의 머리 위나 배후에서 덮친다.
Les feuilles qui poussent sur le corps de Jungko sontnextrêmement tranchantes. Ce Pokémon est très agile.nIl bondit de branche en branche avant de sauter surnson ennemi.
Die Blätter, die auf Gewaldros Körper wachsen, sind sehrnscharfkantig. Dieses Pokémon ist sehr agil. Es hüpft vonnAst zu Ast und springt seine Feinde von oben oder hinten an.
Las hojas que le salen a Sceptile del cuerpo tienen unosnbordes muy afilados. Este Pokémon es muy ágil, va saltandonde rama en rama y se lanza sobre el enemigo por la espalda.
Le foglie che crescono sul corpo di Sceptile hanno marginintaglienti. Questo Pokémon è agilissimo, infatti salta danun ramo all’altro e piomba sui nemici sorprendendoli dall’alto.
The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged.nThis Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches ofntrees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
体に　生えた　葉っぱは　鋭い　切れ味。n素早い　身のこなしで　木の　枝を　飛び回りn敵の　頭上や　背後から　襲いかかるぞ。
せなかの　タネには　じゅもくを　げんきにするnえいようが　たくさん　つまっていると　いわれる。nもりの　きを　だいじに　そだてている　ポケモン。
등의 씨앗에는 나무를 건강하게 만드는n영양이 많이 채워져 있다고 전해진다.n숲의 나무를 소중히 키우고 있는 포켓몬이다.
Jungko a des graines qui lui poussent sur le dos. On ditnqu’elles regorgent de nutriments qui revitalisent les arbres.nCe Pokémon s’occupe des forêts avec amour.
Auf Gewaldros Rücken wachsen Samen. Darin sind Nährstoffe,ndie Bäume beleben können. Dieses Pokémon achtet mit vielnFürsorge darauf, dass die Bäume seines Waldes prächtigngedeihen.
A Sceptile le crecen en la espalda unas semillas llenas dennutrientes que sirven para revitalizar los árboles. De hecho,nse dedica a cuidarlos con mimo para que crezcan bien.
Sulla schiena di Sceptile crescono alcuni semi che si dicensiano ricchi di nutrienti per gli alberi. Questo Pokémonncoltiva amorevolmente le sue piante nella foresta.
Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to benbursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémonnraises the trees in a forest with loving care.
背中の　タネには　樹木を　元気にするn栄養が　沢山　詰まっていると　いわれる。n森の　木を　大事に　育てている　ポケモン。
